cards.flavorText: "The wonders of Nyx do not belong solely to the gods."
cards.name: Greater Auramancy

rulings.text: If you have two on the battlefield, they’ll each grant the other one shroud.

cards.text:
Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

cards.flavorText:
"In the arrogance of my youth, I believed I knew all there was to know. Now, my greatest wisdom is a humble awareness of all I have yet to learn."
—Teferi
cards.name: Omniscience

rulings.text: If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions of each spell you cast.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Tormenting Voice, those must be paid to cast the card.

Once you cast Omniscience, if it’s your turn, you’ll have priority immediately after it resolves. You can cast another spell before any player can attempt to remove Omniscience with spells or abilities.

cards.text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

cards.flavorText: "If you wish to assassinate a master assassin, you'll have to do better than that."
cards.name: No Mercy

rulings.text: If the damage to you is all prevented or redirected, then damage was not dealt to you, and this does not trigger.

cards.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
